articles.description: Apple's silicon transition is set to kick into high gear with the M1X and M2 processors on the way along with a Mac Pro chip that could be the fastest processor ever made.
articles.content:
Skip to contentType your search and hit enter
When Apple released the M1 chip at the end of last year, two things were clear: Macs were a whole lot faster and the future was incredibly bright. What … [+6178 chars]
